Web3 is definitely sneaking into the mainstream in style.

2/ DePIN can‚Äôt scale on monoliths.

On Polkadot, peaq runs a custom runtime not EVM purpose-built for machine coordination, identity, and rewards.

And it evolves at the chain level, not the app level. No waiting for L1 forks or governance gridlock.

1. DePIN needs deterministic coordination across systems.

Devices, vehicles, energy nodes they need to trust each other without trusting third parties.

Polkadot‚Äôs shared security and XCM give peaq deterministic guarantees across multiple domains.

This isn‚Äôt bridging.

@peaq isn‚Äôt building a blockchain. It‚Äôs building real-world infrastructure.

To do that, it needs more than blockspace it needs coordination.

That‚Äôs why @Polkadot isn‚Äôt just a platform. It‚Äôs a protocol layer peaq can compose with.

Let‚Äôs break that down. https://t.co/Nk2ts6v3wA
